cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 130 miles south of Charleston, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-north-east, skirting the southeast U.S. coast toward South and North Carolina
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the South Carolina coast (Charleston area)

port.name: Port of Palm Beach District, FL

weather_observation.watch_coast: North of Ponte Vedra Beach FL to Savannah River GA (Hurricane Watch). Tropical Storm Watch areas begin north of Chincoteague VA.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Flagler/Volusia County line FL northward to Savannah River GA. Hurricane Warning north of Savannah River to North Carolina/Virginia border.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeast U.S. coastline from northeastern Florida through the Carolinas and Mid-Atlantic states
weather_observation.wind: Gusty winds earlier today with brief tropical-storm-force gusts; conditions improving as the storm pulls away.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at the port; surge focus now well north of Palm Beach.
weather_observation.rainfall: 1â€“2 inches possible, well below major-flood threshold.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents may continue for another 24 hours.
